title: Unable to connect to server
body:
Hey guys,
as Riot has  no idea what the cause of this issue/bug is i thought im gonna ask the community.
Maybe one of you guys has more clue and can actually give advice.
When the loading screen should appear i get a blackscreen and the notification in a pop up that im unable to connect to the server.
My internet works fine via cable and ive used port forwarding, the application isnt blocked by the firewall.
There is no reason that this should happen,
Does anyone else have this problem and how have you been able to fix it.

Thank you in advance !


Shiro {{champion:103}}
